content: greet the great outdoors with a sleek and stylish headband ideal for hand-painted yarn with short color changes the alternating stitches of brioche stockinette soften the transition from one color to the next trimmed with contrasting purl piping it s a sporty choice to chase away the chills and since it s made seamlessly from start to finish there s no sewing required headband is worked in rounds from bottom up with back shaped by short row
